itemselectr 0.1
  • Reference

    Identify influential cases and examine their impact

    influential.cases.Rd

    Calculates generalized Cook's Distance statistics. Removes a specified number of cases with largest gCD values. Compares factor loadings, fit statistics and reliabilities of full data set with the filtered data set.

    influential.cases(x, ncases = 1)

    Arguments

    x

    Data frame containing items

    ncases

    The number of cases to treat as influential. This value can be set to 1 and then adjusted in subsequent analyses.

    Value

    A list containing (a) the factor loadings, (b) fit statistics of a single factor solution, and (c) the Cronbach alpha coefficients of the full and filtered data sets.

    Examples

    library(lordif)
data(Anxiety)
influential.cases(Anxiety[1:250, 4:32], 1)

#> $influential.cases
#>       41 
#> 4.911312 
#> 
#> $loadings
#>      All Filtered
#> R1  0.82     0.81
#> R2  0.82     0.81
#> R3  0.84     0.82
#> R4  0.83     0.83
#> R5  0.77     0.77
#> R6  0.76     0.74
#> R7  0.77     0.77
#> R8  0.59     0.56
#> R9  0.66     0.64
#> R10 0.86     0.85
#> R11 0.63     0.61
#> R12 0.68     0.66
#> R13 0.68     0.66
#> R14 0.68     0.66
#> R15 0.76     0.76
#> R16 0.80     0.79
#> R17 0.73     0.71
#> R18 0.65     0.63
#> R19 0.82     0.81
#> R20 0.84     0.82
#> R21 0.51     0.47
#> R22 0.85     0.84
#> R23 0.72     0.71
#> R24 0.83     0.82
#> R25 0.63     0.63
#> R26 0.78     0.78
#> R27 0.85     0.84
#> R28 0.76     0.75
#> R29 0.82     0.81
#> 
#> $fit
#>         All Filtered
#> srmr  0.050    0.052
#> RMSEA 0.090    0.091
#> TLI   0.861    0.852
#> CFI   0.871    0.863
